glsa.title: GNUMP3d: Directory traversal and XSS vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: GNUMP3d is vulnerable to directory traversal and cross-site scripting attacks that may result in information disclosure or the compromise of a browser.

background.p: GNUMP3d is a streaming server for MP3s, OGG vorbis files, movies and other media formats.

description.p: Steve Kemp reported about two cross-site scripting attacks that are related to the handling of files (CVE-2005-3424, CVE-2005-3425). Also reported is a directory traversal vulnerability which comes from the attempt to sanitize input paths (CVE-2005-3123).

impact.p: A remote attacker could exploit this to disclose sensitive information or inject and execute malicious script code, potentially compromising the victim's browser.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
